Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.metaclasses.meta6_extendClasses

[docs]def eggsFunc(obj):
    return obj.value * 4



[docs]def hamFunc(obj,value):
    return value + "Ham"




[docs]class Extender(type):
    def __new__(self,classname,supers,classdic):
        classdic['eggs'] = eggsFunc
        classdic['ham'] = hamFunc
        return type.__new__(self,classname,supers,classdic)




[docs]class Client1(metaclass=Extender):
    def __init__(self,value):
        self.value = value

[docs]    def spam(self):
        return self.value * 2




[docs]class Client2(metaclass=Extender):
     value = "ni?"

if __name__ == '__main__':
    X = Client1("NI!")
    print(X.spam())
    print(X.eggs())
    print(X.ham("Bacon"))

    X2 = Client2()
    print(X2.eggs())
    print(X2.ham("Bacon"))
